roleset.name: not costing much, reasonably priced
roleset.note: INEXPENSIVE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, FrameNet (from inexpensive.01-j)

example.name: args 1,2
example.text: Beer was inexpensive at 5 bottles in a pail on ice for 65 pesos.
example.arg: at 5 bottles in a pail on ice for 65 pesos

example.name: reversed
example.text: The price was inexpensive for a delish breakfast.

example.name: args1, 3
example.text: Guerilla warfare was inexpensive for the attackers, but very costly for those trying to beat it down.
